resources.string: "The app for this icon isn't installed. You can remove it, or search for the app and install it manually."
Touch and hold the widget to move it around the home screen
You’re ready to start using your phone
You’re ready to start using your tablet
Make sure that you swipe from the right or left edge to the middle of the screen and let go.
You learned how to swipe from the right to go back. Next, learn how to switch apps.
"Make sure that you don't swipe too close to the bottom of the screen."
Make sure that you swipe from the far-right or far-left edge.
To go back to the last screen, swipe with two fingers from the left or right edge to the middle of the screen.
To change sensitivity of the back gesture, go to Settings
This app is not compatible with Multi-window. Close Multi-window and open this app?
"The app for this icon isn't updated. You can update manually to re-enable this shortcut or remove the icon."
"If you delete the app data, Game enhancer's Store game icons feature will be disabled and the game icons will be displayed in the app drawer."
If you delete the shortcut for Game enhancer, the Store game icons feature will be disabled and the game icons will be displayed in the app drawer.
You completed the go home gesture. Next, learn how to go back.
You completed the go home gesture.
"Make sure that you don't pause before letting go."
Make sure that you swipe up from the bottom edge of the screen.
Make sure that you swipe straight up.
Swipe up from the bottom of your screen. This gesture always takes you to the home screen.
Swipe up with two fingers from the bottom of the screen. This gesture always takes you to the home screen.
Allows an application to set notification badges on its Xperia Home application icons
Allows an application to display notification badges on its Xperia Home application icons
Easily access your most-used apps directly from the home screen. Suggestions will change based on your routines. Apps on the bottom row will move up to your home screen.
Easily access your most-used apps directly from the home screen. Suggestions will change based on your routines. Apps in the favourites row will move to your home screen.
Get app suggestions on the bottom row of your home screen
Get app suggestions on the favourites row of your home screen
No more room in the Favourites tray
Touch and hold to move a widget.
When you swipe right from main home screen
When you swipe left from main home screen
To show Notification Dots, turn on app notifications for %1$s
%1$s is not allowed to make phone calls
Show quick search box at the bottom of the home screen
Make sure that you swipe up from the bottom edge of the screen.
Make sure that you swipe straight up, then pause.
To switch between apps, swipe up with two fingers from the bottom of your screen, hold, then release.
Allows an app to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows the app to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows the app to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Close the pop-up window and try again
Close the pop-up window before using screen pinning
Next, select an app to be displayed in the main screen.
You can find this later in the %1$s app
Tap another app to use split-screen
Your work apps can’t send you notifications, use your battery or access your location
Work apps are off. Your work apps can’t send you notifications, use your battery or access your location
